Content.Text: Dum-Da-Da-DAA!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>!
I have a gift to give today!
<PAGE>
Come to my spring and bring <CHILD_NAME>
with you!
Toodles!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for coming!
I want to give a gift to <CHILD_NAME>
today!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! What is it?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! What is it?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come over here and open your mouth!
I have something yummy for you to eat!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, eat up!

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I turned into a grown-up!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I turned into a grown-up!

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm gonna go show everybody!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm gonna go show everybody!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I gave <CHILD_NAME> <RED>grow-up candy</RED>!
<PAGE>
Any child who eats it will turn into
an adult for <RED>30 days</RED> or so.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've been helpful to me, <MYNAME>.
This is my little thank you.
<PAGE>
And <CHILD_NAME> seems to be delighted!
I'm so glad!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't worry, I put magic in it so that
kids don't do anything foolish while
they're in grown-up form!
<PAGE>
When the grow-up candy wears off, tell
Alice.
<PAGE>
I'll give her a supply of grow-up candy
so you can get it from her.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I'm going back to my spring!
Bye-bye!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Like the Harvest Goddess told you,
I'm in charge of the grow-up candy.
<PAGE>
When the effect wears off, talk to me.
But I'm not giving it out for free!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You have to bring me <GREEN>royal jelly</GREEN>
in exchange! No exceptions!
Got it?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You're greedy, Sis!
The Harvest Goddess never said anything
about that!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hush up, you!
It's fine!
She put ME in charge of it!
<PAGE>
So you understand, <MYNAME>?
You want grow-up candy, you bring me
<GREEN>royal jelly</GREEN>!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take you home now.
It's very generous of me, so show some
appreciation.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See you around, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <PARENT>!
I showed everybody what happened to me!
<PAGE>
They all said it's really cool that I
turned into a grown-up!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <PARENT>!
I showed everybody what happened to me!
<PAGE>
They all said it's really cool that I
turned into a grown-up!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So it wears off after a while and I turn
back? Well, I'll get a lot of things
done in the meantime!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So it wears off after a while and I turn
back? Well, I'll get a lot of things
done in the meantime!
